summary: The "Bolstering Research And Innovation Now Act" (BRAIN Act) addresses brain tumor research, treatment, and patient care. It mandates the creation of a public database for biospecimen collections, establishes a Glioblastoma Therapeutics Network and brain tumor immunotherapy awards, and launches a national public awareness campaign for cancer clinical trials and biomarker testing. The bill also initiates pilot programs for brain tumor survivor monitoring and care, and directs the FDA to issue guidance on ensuring patient access to clinical trials.
